bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tui 陰㿉 , yin (i.e. scrotal) prominence-illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gan lan 橄欖：陰腎㿗腫：橄欖核、荔枝核、山楂核等分，燒存性，研 末，每服二錢 , “[To cure] yin[-member, i.e. penis, and] kidneys [i.e. testicles] affected by breakdown - illness with swelling : burn equal amounts of gan lan he , li zhi he , shan zha he while maintaining their nature, and grind to a powder. The dosage to be ingested is 2 qian ”.
